amendment.description: Amendment deleted section 114 of the bill which restricted the VA from using funds to implement provisions of Public Law 107-287, the Department of Veterans Affairs Emergency Preparedness Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 114 from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 347 - 77 (Roll no. 451).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Smith (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 347 - 77 (Roll no. 451).
